title: Zebra Technologies winding down Fetch-based mobile robot group
description:
Zebra said the move allows it to 'further sharpen our strategic focus on digitizing and automating frontline workflows and on our investments in key growth areas.'

The post Zebra Technologies winding down Fetch-based mobile robot group appeared first on The Robot Report.
